[ALERT] Happy Holidays from LowEndBox – Christmas Offers Incoming!

December 22, 2018 @ 2:00 pm, by Daniel Spritzer

Happy Holidays to all of our readers and followers at LowEndBox!

To take some time to reflect on some nostalgia, LowEndBox was first launched in 2008, as a place to discuss running very low end virtual private servers. Throughout the years as the hosting industry evolved, we have adapted and made changes along the way in order to successfully continue to meet your modern-day hosting needs, however, our mission, goal, and passion has always remained the same since day one: to help others achieve affordable hosting, and to be a one-stop resource for all your hosting needs.

Today, LowEndBox is not only a helpful resource for those seeking a VPS solution, but also shared/reseller hosting, dedicated servers, hybrid servers, VPN’s, and so much more!

With the holiday season upon us, we would like to take the time to reflect and thank you for being there with us and for joining the LEB movement. Our movement is to make noise in the hosting industry, and to disrupt the overpriced hosting market. It is to set a standard for affordable and transparent hosting in the marketplace. We’ve been successful with advancing this movement for over 10 years and counting, and we are happy for the positive contributions we have made to people’s online goals throughout the years. None of this would not be possible without your contributions to the community – so thank you LowEndBox reader!

HEADS UP: We will be launching a stream of VERY AGGRESSIVE offers throughout the holiday season from various of your favorite providers! We anticipate larger traffic activity than ever before throughout the holiday season, and have some really attractive deals lined up for you guys, so please be sure to bookmark and frequently refresh LowEndBox.com — be quick to act upon an offer that you like, as we can guarantee that only limited supplies will be available!

We are so happy that you’re here, and Happy Holidays! Stay Tuned for the Holiday Stream… it’s definitely one you don’t want to miss.

Good luck and please let us know if you have any questions/comments!
